title: Can't connect to chat or join ranked games
body:
This game is just getting more and more broken.

On that note, does anyone else lag when Zed used his shadow clone?

replies.body: I can't connect to the in-client chat either.{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

> [{quoted}](name=nochillgamer,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0RqGm5dt,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-05T10:33:41.074+0000)
>
> I can't connect to the in-client chat either.{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

I'm in a normal and everything is fine. Weird.
Have the same issue. Service Status seems to say the the servers are all good.
Wondered if I had gotten my first ever chat ban or something, good to know it's just servers.
Haha Right? I was playing agaisnt 3 guys in a clan and apparently thats all it takes. We were only mildly deleting them Lol
lmao i get this after a ranked game w a bot troll who walked to lane and died to the enemy top repeated till 13 deaths and afk'd reported to riot and nothin happens classic riot strikes again
Same here
Same issue for me as well, can que for treeline and norms though.
Also anyone having issues of loads of white squares appearing on screen when someone uses a spell, places down a ward or destroys a tower?
thats processing lag, get a better gpu
oh thanks for telling me (: soz for the late reply

> [{quoted}](name=Blinez,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0RqGm5dt,comment-id=001a00000000,timestamp=2016-07-09T08:37:46.481+0000)
>
> oh thanks for telling me (: soz for the late reply

lol by 2 months
i can't Reconnect to chat and I just wanted to play Amumu JG {{champion:32}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:11}}
I cant Reconnect To Chat :(

I am trying to que for a normal  game and I am getting errors.
After trying to que several times and the client has told me that I have declined too many games and may face a penalty, even though i accepted all games.
I cannot connect to chat
Hey, are u that guy i know? i lost people on friend list lol
I can't even login -_-
Cannot connect to chat and now i cannot connect to lol. OMG
so do i still get my rp...?

If you don't get your RP but the payment has gone through (check your bank account or your paypal etc, however you paid) then submit a support ticket under account/billing and they will be able to help you.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/ttr1RTwc-connection-issues-552016

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce
This issue should be fixed immediately because I found people can abuse this and insult and be toxic with no restraint because the report option isn't even  available.

I can't even log on. Was in queue for an aram that took 5 minutes before I tried to exit and re-queue. It bugged up so I had to quit the game and re log in but now I can't even log in! RIOT WHY YOU NO WORK?
so do i still get my rp...?
They just wanted more viewers on the MSI International :p SUP ALL THE WAY!
Sever is broken     :     ^)
same here
same problem. using windows 10 pc
This just in, ranked queues currently disabled... back to overwatch!
Same. So annoying...{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
yep games down{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
same here
I am also having this issue
Same herecant connect to chat
Same problem here {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Same
